item.title: 交易员质疑美联储降息步伐，国债走低
item.description: 本周伊始，国债下跌，交易员们期待美国通胀数据为美联储是否会在今年大幅降息提供进一步线索。【原文：Treasuries fell at the start of the week with traders looking ahead to US inflation data for further clues on whether the Federal Reserve will deliver a jumbo interest-rate cut this year.】

item.title: 德拉吉称欧盟若无巨额支出和联合债务将面临风险
item.description: 欧洲中央银行前行长马里奥-德拉吉呼吁欧盟每年额外投资多达 8000 亿欧元（合 8,840 亿美元），以提高欧盟的竞争力，并承诺定期发行共同债券，与中国和美国竞争。【原文：Former European Central Bank President Mario Draghi called on the EU to invest as much as €800 billion ($884 billion) extra a year to make the bloc more competitive and to commit to the regular issuance of common bonds to compete with China and the US.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊称日元套利风险对股市仍有影响
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）认为，如果美联储本月大幅降息，美国股市将面临日元套利交易进一步平仓的风险。【原文：US equities are at risk from a further unwinding of yen-funded carry trades if the Federal Reserve delivers a jumbo interest-rate cut this month, according to Morgan Stanley’s Michael Wilson.】

item.title: 欧洲央行开始降息，欧元区抵押贷款反弹
item.description: 由于利率下降为购房提供了支持，欧洲银行的抵押贷款在 7 月份继续反弹。【原文：Mortgage lending by Europe’s banks continued a rebound in July as falling interest rates support home buying.】

item.title: 欧尔班暗示匈牙利央行行长人选范围缩小
item.description: 匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班表示，他计划合并财政和经济部门，并暗示受改革影响的部长之一将出任央行行长。【原文：Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orban said he plans to combine the finance and economy portfolios and hinted that one of the ministers affected by the overhaul would become central bank governor.】

item.title: 苹果希望通过新设备重振疲软的可穿戴设备部门
item.description: 尽管苹果公司的 iPhone 16 系列将是其周一产品发布会的焦点，但其低迷的可穿戴设备业务也将得到提振。【原文：While Apple Inc.’s iPhone 16 line will be the focus of its product launch event Monday, its slumping wearable-device business is poised to get a boost as well.】

item.title: 台湾对美出口超中国纪录创月度新高
item.description: 台湾对美国的出口超过了任何一个月对中国大陆的出口记录，凸显了东亚供应链的迅速变化。【原文：Taiwan’s exports to the US topped the record for any month’s shipments to China, underscoring rapidly shifting East Asian supply chains.】

item.title: 南非土地银行达成协议结束债务违约
item.description: 南非最大的农民贷款机构在拖欠债务四年后达成协议，恢复偿还债务。【原文：South Africa’s biggest lender to farmers reached an agreement to resume repayments on its debt, four years after it defaulted.】

item.title: 贡渥集团首席执行官表示，贡渥集团正在通过北美交易增加石油储备
item.description: 贡渥集团联合创始人兼首席执行官托尔比约恩-托恩奎斯特（Torbjörn Törnqvist）表示，贡渥集团正在加强其原油业务，尤其是美国市场的交易量在不断增长。【原文：Gunvor Group is ramping up its crude oil business, with trading volumes growing particularly out of the US, according to its co-founder and Chief Executive Officer Torbjörn Törnqvist.】

item.title: 阿曼 OQ 公司在勘探部门具有里程碑意义的首次公开募股中出售 25% 的股份
item.description: 阿曼国有能源公司 OQ SAOC 计划在首次公开募股中出售其勘探和生产业务 25% 的股份，这可能是这个海湾国家有史以来规模最大的一次公开募股。【原文：Oman’s state energy company OQ SAOC plans to sell a 25% stake in its exploration and production business in an initial public offering that could be the Gulf country’s biggest on record.】

item.title: 特拉菲古拉公司称欧佩克+政策困境引发 "混乱信息
item.description: 世界顶级原油交易商之一表示，"欧佩克+"在协调该组织的目标与市场需求方面正面临两难境地，该石油卡特尔正在发出一个 "混乱的信息"。【原文：OPEC+ is facing a dilemma when it comes to reconciling the group’s goals with what the market needs, and the oil cartel is sending a “confused message,” according to one of the world’s top crude traders.】

item.title: 欧股反弹，焦点转向美国通胀和欧洲央行降息
item.description: 欧洲股市走高，在经历了 18 个月来最糟糕的一周后反弹，交易商的注意力转向本周晚些时候的美国关键通胀数据和欧洲央行利率决议。【原文：European stocks advanced, rebounding after the worst week in 18 months, as traders’ attention turns to key US inflation data and the European Central Bank rates decision later in the week.】

item.title: Trafigura 称布伦特油价将升至 60 美元，但警告不要过于看空
item.description: 主要大宗商品贸易商 Trafigura 集团和贡渥集团（Gunvor Group Ltd. ）对石油市场的前景描绘了一幅暗淡的图景，对中国的需求和充足的供应表示了同样的担忧。【原文：Major commodity traders Trafigura Group and Gunvor Group Ltd. have painted a bleak picture on the outlook for the oil market, echoing concerns over Chinese demand and plentiful supply.】

item.title: Energy Aspects 称中国可能低价购买 SPR 用油
item.description: 根据 Energy Aspects Ltd. 的数据，在目前的低价位上，中国炼油企业可能每月购买合计 1600 万桶石油，以补充国家战略石油储备。【原文：Chinese refiners are likely buying a combined 16 million barrels of oil a month to replenish the nation’s Strategic Petroleum Reserve at current low prices, according to Energy Aspects Ltd.】

item.title: 卡西迪资本为新私募股权投资基金融资 20 亿欧元
item.description: 私募股权公司 Castik Capital 为其最新基金募集了 20 亿欧元（22 亿美元），增强了其投资欧洲公司的实力。【原文：Private equity firm Castik Capital raised €2 billion ($2.2 billion) for its latest fund, boosting its firepower to invest in European companies.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市在 2024 年最糟糕一周后反弹
item.description: 2024年4月23日星期二，英国伦敦市，伦敦证券交易所集团公司办公中庭的一块板上显示股票价格信息。4 月 21 日（周一），富时 100 指数收盘价创下一年多来的新高，原因是近期股市波动和地缘政治风险促使投资者纷纷涌入英国基准指数中的防御性板块。摄影：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：Stock price information displayed on a board at the London Stock Exchange Group Plc in the company's office atrium in the City of London, UK, on Tuesday, April 23, 2024. The FTSE 100 Index closed at a record high, on Monday, April 21, for the first time in more than a year, as recent equity market volatility and geopolitical risks prompted investors to pile into the defensive sectors that characterize the UK benchmark. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美国比特币 ETF 净流出时间最长，损失 12 亿美元
item.description: 美国比特币交易所交易基金创下了自年初上市以来最长的单日净流出记录，这也是全球市场在充满挑战的时期从高风险资产撤退的一个缩影。【原文：US Bitcoin exchange-traded funds have posted their longest run of daily net outflows since listing at the start of the year, part of a wider retreat from riskier assets in a challenging period for global markets.】

item.title: 中国成立由北京支持的锂业集团开发盐湖
item.description: 中国五矿集团公司（China Minmetals Corp. ）将控制一家由该省支持的锂公司，以加快发展从该国最西部盐湖中提取电池材料的 "世界级 "产业。【原文：China Minmetals Corp. will take control of a province-backed lithium company in a bid to speed development of a “world-class” industry extracting the battery material from salt lakes in the far west of the country.】

item.description: Big Lots 公司申请破产保护，结束了这家折扣零售商多年来的颓势。【原文：Big Lots Inc. filed for bankruptcy protection, capping a multi-year decline for the discount retailer.】

item.title: 期权市场在大选前高度关注美联储
item.description: 在全球金融市场上，期权交易商正准备发动一波与美国大选相关的赌注；就在美联储的政策声明公布之后。【原文：Across global financial markets, options traders are preparing to unleash a wave of wagers tied to the US election — just as soon as the Federal Reserve’s policy announcement is out of the way.】

item.title: 德拉吉将公布旨在治愈欧盟单一市场弊病的计划
item.description: 预计马里奥-德拉吉将敲响欧盟经济衰退风险的警钟，并呼吁进行大量投资以促进欧盟单一市场的发展。【原文：Mario Draghi is expected to sound the alarm over the risk of the European Union’s economic decline and call for significant investments to boost its single market.】

item.title: 挪威财富基金对环境、社会和公司治理 "各自为政 "表示担忧
item.description: 挪威1.7万亿美元的财富基金正在敦促各国不要偏离全球环境、社会和公司治理报告标准太远，因为该基金正在监测各辖区的进展情况。【原文：Norway’s $1.7 trillion wealth fund is urging countries not to stray too far from global ESG reporting standards as it monitors progress across jurisdictions.】

item.title: 欧洲央行的经济希望面临风险，因为消费者暂停消费
item.description: 欧元区的消费者并没有急于打开钱包，这让一些人不禁要问，他们本应引领的经济复苏是否会到来。【原文：Euro-zone consumers aren’t rushing to open their wallets — prompting some to ask whether the economic recovery they were supposed to spearhead will ever arrive.】

item.title: 维托尔认为中国汽油需求将于今年或明年达到顶峰
item.description: 据贸易巨头维托尔集团（Vitol Group）称，中国的汽油使用量将开始下降，这加剧了人们对石油需求相对于供应不温不火的担忧。【原文：China’s gasoline use is set to start fading, adding to concerns about tepid oil demand relative to supply, according to trading behemoth Vitol Group.】

item.title: 市场担忧加剧，摩根士丹利再次下调石油预测
item.description: 摩根士丹利在几周内第二次下调了布伦特原油价格预期，原因是需求挑战日益严峻，而供应仍然充足。【原文：Morgan Stanley reduced its Brent crude price forecasts for the second time in a matter of weeks, as demand challenges mount while supplies remain plentiful.】

item.title: 复苏希望渺茫，中国股市濒临五年最低点
item.description: 由于盈利和经济复苏乏力，看跌情绪笼罩市场，中国股市即将跌至 2 月份创下的五年新低。【原文：Chinese stocks are on the brink of falling to a five-year low seen in February as bearish sentiment grips the market amid a lack of earnings and economic recovery.】
